meanings: find[figure out, come up with] a way

vlive.korean: 이 방법이 맞는 거겠죠? This is the right way, isn't it? 듣기 View video 콬TV (WHYNOT) : 적어도 난 진짜 연애중이야 #남사친이_불편해졌다 #삼각관계 [리얼:타임:러브2] EP5

vlive.korean: 폴라로이드 잘 찍는 방법이 있어요? Is there a way to take polaroids well? 듣기 View video NU'EST : 뉴이스트와 스푼즈가 함께하는 Special V LIVE [THE NU'STORE]
vlive.english: Is there a way to take polaroids well?

vlive.korean: [부기 빼는 방법 알려줘] 부기 빼는 방법이요? [Tell me how to reduce swelling] A way to reduce swelling? 듣기 View video V PICK! : [MONSTA X] 겨드랑이가 있는데 왜 치지를 못하니.. 채씨의 <겨드랑이 치기 좋은 날>🐢 (Hyungwon's how to remove swelling out)
vlive.english: [Tell me how to reduce swelling] A way to reduce swelling?

vlive.korean: 안 끊긴다, 신기해 - 알려줘 방법? - 응? It's not damaged. Amazing. - You want to know how? - What? 듣기 View video Stray Kids : 막내의 사생활 25 🦊
vlive.english: It's not damaged. Amazing. - You want to know how? - What?

vlive.korean: "요새 러닝머신만 30분씩 뛰는데 더 좋은 운동 방법 없을까요?" "I run on a treadmill for 30 minutes. Is there any better way to work out?" 듣기 View video Stray Kids : 리노리방😺야식시간
vlive.english: "I run on a treadmill for 30 minutes. Is there any better way to work out?"
